Texts.Chs:
一个不安全的变形种族，来自名叫盖亚的星球。

^orange;食性^reset;：杂食性

^orange;天赋^reset;:
HP & 伤害x^green;1.1^reset;
^green;抗性^reset;:
： +^green;毒素抗性、射线抗性、电系抗性、暗影抗性、辐射抗性、物理抗性
+^green;30^reset;%寒气抗性

^orange;环境^reset;:
葱郁，森林，丛林，雨林，湿地，冻土，极地生态：+^green;10^reset%移速 & 跳跃高度
沼泽，海洋，岩浆，火山生态：-^red;10^reset;%移速 & 跳跃高度

^orange;弱点^reset;:
能量 x^red;0.9^reset;
^red;抗性^reset;: -^red;40^reset;%火焰抗性
Texts.Eng:
A race of shapeshifting and insecure creatures borne from a planet called Gaia.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Health & Damage x^green;1.1^reset;.
  ^green;Resist^reset;:
    +^green;10^reset;% Poison, Cosmic, Electric, Shadow, Radioactive, Physical.
    +^green;30^reset;% Ice.

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Lush, Forest, Jungle, Rainforest, Snow, Tundra, and Arctic biomes: +^green;10^reset;% Speed and Jump
  Bog, Ocean, Magma, and Volcanic biomes: -^red;10^reset;% Speed and Jump

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Energy x^red;0.9^reset;
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;40^reset;% Fire
